title: check_finish_ingest_item_command
description: Check finish ingest item command schema.

ingest_item_step_id.description: A unique identifier that is used to track ingest messages for a single document to keep ingest document status up-to-date.

ingest_item_id.description: Id of an ingest item stored in the database.

error_message.description: Message that describes why a message for a specific ingest_item_step_id has failed.
